data.name: Vodafone 5G Reality
data.description:
Vodafone 5G Reality is the first open metaverse developed in Spain, the first virtual and interactive commercial solution on the 5G network for Vodafone customers and non-customers.

The experience will be adapted depending on the device you choose by downloading the application directly from the device with the Meta Quest 2 glasses or from the smartphone with the mobile app.

1) Immersive content of different types (tourism, cinema, adventure, games and relaxation)
2) Expand and enjoy your hobbies by interacting with the metaverse in real time.
3) Simple handling with two manual controllers that will allow you to interact with the virtual environment and the avatars of your friends.
4) Mobile application to discover augmented reality content and immersive video, and to select your friends, and be able to live an experience with them with VR glasses.
5) Interact with your friends in real time with your own avatar.
